thread.title: UNC fan dresses up as Duke’s Grayson Allen, trips people around campus
thread.title_full: UNC fan dresses up as Duke’s Grayson Allen, trips people around campus

title: UNC fan dresses up as Duke’s Grayson Allen, trips people around campus
text:
Thursday night will feature one of college basketball’s greatest rivalries : North Carolina vs. Duke. 
The No. 8 Tar Heels will travel to Cameron Indoor Stadium to take on the No. 18 Blue Devils. 
In preparation for the highly anticipated matchup, one UNC fan decided to troll Duke’s most polarizing player, Grayson Allen. 
Allen has built a reputation as being one of the dirtiest players in college basketball due to numerous incidents of tripping opposing players . In this hilarious video, the Tar Heel fan donned an Allen jersey and walked around the UNC campus tripping fellow students. 
You check it out in the video below. 
This isn’t the first time Allen has been trolled, and it certainly won’t be the last. 
This article first appeared on NESN.com and was syndicated with permission.
